price: 31. Kaan kuu waxyoonnay ee Kitaabka (Qur’aanka) ah waa Xaq, rumeyn wixii ka horreeyey (oo Kutub Alle ah). Hubaal Alle addoomahiisa wuu ka War Qabaa, Arkaa.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ لَخَبِيرُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī awḥaynā ilayka mina al-kitābi huwa al-ḥaqu muṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi inna al-laha biʿibādihi lakhabīrun baṣīrun
